comments.author: SnooRobots777
comments.body:
Yup, as people mentioned. With your hobbies there is an easy way to find people to hang out with. Skateboarding is pretty decent in krakow. As soon as it gets warmer hit "Park Jordana" skatepark it is always filled with people skating.

There are also 2 places you can skate during Winter one is a pool - look up pool forum and another one is streetpark. The later had dedicated skateboarding session you can come to.

You can always hit up local skaters on ig as well just use hash tags for krakow and skateboarding.

comments.author: UpstairsContact9244
comments.body: Also if u ever tried crossfit - i recommend crossfit 72d for its community;)

comments.author: UpstairsContact9244
comments.body:
There is plenty of expats here so im sure you will find someone!:) there is a plenty of events around the town for foreigners
There is a big skateboarding community, cold dipping on zakrzowek community, running crews and all kind of other sport opportunities to join! 

- check the history of this subreddit and groups on facebook for recommendations and you will be fine!:) 

Good luck and have fun;)

comments.author: Ok-Spinach-883
comments.body: thank you i appreciate your comment so much
